SLiCAP and Structured Electronics DesignÂ¶

SLiCAP has been developed as a tool for courses on Structured Electronics Design.

Structured Electronics Design is a systems engineering approach to the design of electronic circuits. It is taught at the TU Delft. SLiCAP is intended to derive and solve design equations of analog electronic circuits. The Course Book comprises many examples of which the source code can be downloaded. This book also presents the theory behind SLiCAP.
